# King's College London Business

'''King's College London Business Ltd' (formerly KCL Enterprises Ltd (Oct 1992-Feb 2007) and Precis Ltd (May 1992- Oct 1992'') is an English technology transfer private limited company.  A wholly owned subsidiary of King's College London, King's Business "supports and commercialises the research of Kingâ€™s academic staff".
Board of Directors
The company officers include:
* Annie Kent (Director)
* Stephen Large (Director)
* Nicholas Leake (Director)
* Simon Cruickshank (Secretary)
